name: zitadel
description: Zitadel is a self-hosted identity and access management platform with OpenID Connect and OAuth 2.0 support. It offers multi-tenant projects, roles, and login flows and is available both self-hosted and as a managed cloud service.

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Implement modern authentication flows with full OIDC support for web and mobile applications

features.title: REST API
features.description: Secure API access with standard OAuth flows including authorization code, client credentials, and device flow

features.title: User Management
features.description: Create and manage users with customizable profile fields, metadata, and authentication methods

features.title: Custom Login Flows
features.description: Configure authentication requirements including MFA, passwordless, and social login per application

features.title: Audit Logging
features.description: Track all authentication events, user actions, and administrative changes for compliance and security
